snippet.title: Cannonball | The Ultimate Enhanced OutRun Arcade Experience
snippet.description:
Cannonball is OutRun enhanced with new features for modern systems.
The classic Outrun (1986) arcade game has been completely rewritten from scratch. Cannonball is not an emulator but utilises the original OutRun arcade ROM files.

I explore the game and it's features using the Cannonball Retroarch core.

Cannonball:
https://github.com/djyt/cannonball/wiki
https://github.com/djyt/cannonball/wiki/Cannonball-Manual

The Retroarch (Libretro) core:
https://docs.libretro.com/library/cannonball/

LayOut (OutRun track editor)
https://github.com/djyt/layout/wiki

● Support Retro Recollections:
★ Watch on LBRY: 
https://lbry.tv/@retrorecollections:a
https://odysee.com/@retrorecollections:a
★ Become a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/retrorecollections
★ Buy me a coffee: https://www.ko-fi.com/retrorecollections

● Links
★ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dangelus
★ RetroUnlim: http://www.retrounlim.com/uploader/retro-recollections/
★ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/retro_recollections/
★ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RetroRecollections/

#cannonball #outrun #enhanced
